name: Mega Ramp Car Jumping
description:
You’re about to careen down the biggest, raddest ramp ever built at speeds cars were never built to reach.

A mega, mega ramp — so steep and so high you’d have to be crazy to even think about it.

Get ready for Mega Ramp Car Jumping!

Discover multiple ridiculously dangerous atmospheric feats, including:

- In the clouds, dodging hot air balloons
- In the clouds, along a network of shipping containers
- Among the peaks of skyscrapers
- In the mountain peaks
- In the clouds of Hawaii
- In the winter mountains
- Even in outer space!

Pick up boosts and power-ups as you go!

Unlock various cars and other cool vehicles (including a tank and a chopper!), see what they can do!

(Whatever you do, don’t crash - you’ve never seen anything like these crashes.)

This game stretches the limits of one-touch play (and cars!), giving you incredible fun and variety that any player can jump right into.

Try out a truly masterful car-jumping game.
